Auckland double murderer Mikaere Puata-Chaney appears in behind-bars Instagram account https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-double-murderer-mikaere-puata-chaney-appears-in-behind-bars-instagram-account/YGBYVEJQ5ZHIBDOCMNDNS46PJU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-double-murderer-mikaere-puata-chaney-appears-in-behind-bars-instagram-account/YGBYVEJQ5ZHIBDOCMNDNS46PJU/ George BlockAnd he's not the only Head Hunter posting from behind bars. Sat, 13 Jan 2024 02:17:19 +0000 Convicted double-murderer Mikaere Puata Chaney and other inmates feature in a string of photos taken behind bars at Auckland South Corrections Facility, then posted to instgram. Staff at the Serco-run prison have seized a phone and asked Instagram to remove the account. Photos / Supplied
